title: "Digging into the Health Data Science Sandbox"
#description: "Data Scientist, Copenhagen University"

Dates: "18-19 April 2024"
Location: KU
categories: [KU, workshop, course, HPC, RDM]

Several Sandbox staff organized a two-day workshop for PhD, postdocs and academic staff on how to use high-performance computing resources and bioinformatics training apps from the Health Data Science Sandbox project. Main topics: fundamentals of accessing UCloud and Sandbox UCloud apps that support pipelines and data analysis guidance for RNA-seq, proteomics, and RDM.
